name: WORLD4
description:
Explore an abstract world that can only be understood through movement. Find your way using four elusive perspectives that expose and conceal your surroundings. Overcome the unexplained, reveal hidden curiosities and secrets within.

WORLD4 is inspired by walkers like Proteus and Gone Home, asking what draws us in to explore and make sense of ambiguous worlds? It has been described by players as a puzzle that is explored but not solved.

Play alone or with others using four displays.

WSAD to move, mouse to look, ESC to quit.


WORLD4 is a work in progress, part experiment and part research project. You can support ongoing development by leaving a comment or sharing.

If you like it, ping me on Twitter @alexandermuscat.

The multi-display build is still experimental and I only demo it on occasion. Shoot me a message if you'd like to give it a try.
